casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
John Coryell KELSEY, II, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157940
COA: 329229 Supreme Court of Michigan. October 11, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to exceed the page limitation for his reply is GRANTED. The 13-page reply submitted on October 9, 2018, is accepted for filing.
